name: ICDEV Monitor
description: Production monitoring agent. Performs log analysis, metric collection, alert correlation, health checking, and makes rollback decisions based on real-time observability data.

skills.name: Analyze Logs
skills.description: Analyze application and infrastructure logs from ELK/Splunk to detect anomalies and error patterns.

skills.name: Collect Metrics
skills.description: Collect and aggregate Prometheus metrics for application and infrastructure health assessment.

skills.name: Correlate Alerts
skills.description: Correlate alerts from multiple monitoring sources to identify root causes and reduce alert fatigue.

skills.name: Check Health
skills.description: Perform comprehensive health checks on deployed applications including HTTP endpoints, database connectivity, and resource usage.
